name: Salsa Fundamentals: Basic Steps & Partnering
description: Master the foundational steps, basic turns, and lead/follow techniques essential for Salsa dancing.

name: Barre & Center: Alignment and Pliés
description: Focus on fundamental barre exercises, core strengthening, and basic center work to build ballet technique.

name: Grooves & Basics: Foundations of Hip-Hop
description: Learn essential hip-hop grooves, basic isolations, and short, fun choreographies to popular tracks.

name: Abrazo & Caminata: The Heart of Tango
description: Explore the fundamental embrace, walking techniques, and basic figures that define Argentine Tango.

name: Release & Explore: Contemporary Technique
description: Focus on floor work, release technique, improvisation, and short contemporary phrases to enhance fluidity and expression.

name: Basic Taps: Shuffles, Flaps & Sounds
description: Learn fundamental tap steps, explore rhythmic variations, and develop clear percussive sounds with your feet.

name: Jazz Choreo: Turns, Leaps & Expression
description: Focus on dynamic jazz technique, turns, leaps, and learn an engaging choreography combining various jazz styles.

name: Hip Shimmies & Isolations: Bellydance Basics
description: Master fundamental bellydance isolations, shimmies, and basic traveling steps to build a strong foundation.

name: Bollywood Fusion: Moves & Expression
description: Learn high-energy Bollywood choreography, expressive hand gestures, and vibrant facial expressions.

name: Smooth Ballroom: Waltz & Foxtrot Fundamentals
description: Master the basic steps, lead and follow techniques for the elegant Waltz and the smooth Foxtrot.

name: Earth & Energy: African Dance Essentials
description: Explore fundamental African dance steps, rhythmic patterns, and expressive movements, often accompanied by live drumming.

name: Commercial Edge: Street Jazz Choreo
description: Learn powerful street jazz choreography, focusing on sharp movements, commercial styling, and performance quality.

name: Flow & Feel: Lyrical Choreography
description: Explore fluid lyrical movements, emotional expression, and learn choreography that emphasizes storytelling through dance.

name: Lindy Hop Basics: Swing Outs & Jumps
description: Master the fundamental 8-count Lindy Hop basic, essential swing outs, and fun partner variations.

name: Palmas & Zapateado: Flamenco Foundations
description: Learn basic Flamenco footwork, hand movements, palmas, and body posture to express the dance's passion.

name: Top Rocks & Footwork: Intro to Breaking
description: Focus on foundational top rocks, basic footwork patterns, and introductory freezes to build your breaking skills.

name: K-Pop Power: Idol Dance Routines
description: Learn and perfect popular K-Pop idol choreographies, focusing on synchronization, energy, and performance.

name: Afrobeat Flow: Rhythms & Moves
description: Explore fundamental Afrobeat steps, body isolations, and rhythmic sequences to popular Afrobeat music.

name: Samba no Pé: Carnival Basics
description: Master the fundamental Samba no Pé step, hip movements, and arm styling to embody the spirit of Carnival.

name: Dancehall Foundations: Grooves & Swag
description: Learn essential Dancehall steps, body isolations, and develop confidence and style in your movement.
